nodes.text: The Voss Orbital Station was a space station that orbited the planet Voss during the Cold War and the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

The Voss Orbital Station was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It serves as the spaceport for Republic players for the planet Voss, and can only be accessed by Republic players with their own ship. Players then can take a shuttle down to the planet's surface.
